Columbus.Green Island Hills (Columbus, Georgia): Columbus is a city in the U.S. state of Georgia and the county seat of the consolidated Muscogee County. Columbus is the second largest city in Georgia, it also has the fourth largest metropolitan area of Georgia. According to the 2013 estimates from the U.S. Census Bureau, Columbus has a population of 202,824 residents, with 316,554 in the greater Columbus-Phenix City metropolitan area.
